data.title: Kobe Bryant, N.Y.C. 2002
data.meta_description: An image of Kobe Bryant sitting on a couch in a room in New York City. Bryant sits on the couch wearing a NYPD black baseball hat, a t-shirt over a long sleeve shirt, sweatpants, and sneakers. Bryant rests his proper left arm on the sofa and has his proper left hand resting against his cheek. His legs are outstretched and rest on a chair that has been pulled in front of the couch. Soda and pizza are on top of a table in the foreground of the image.
data.meta_site_name: National Museum of African American History and Culture

Subject of

Bryant, Kobe Bean, American, 1978 - 2020

Medium

digital

Dimensions

H x W: 3820 pixels × 5770 pixels

File size: 186.69 MB

Description

An image of Kobe Bryant sitting on a couch in a room in New York City. Bryant sits on the couch wearing a NYPD black baseball hat, a t-shirt over a long sleeve shirt, sweatpants, and sneakers. Bryant rests his proper left arm on the sofa and has his proper left hand resting against his cheek. His legs are outstretched and rest on a chair that has been pulled in front of the couch. Soda and pizza are on top of a table in the foreground of the image.
